mapper.sql: id, book_name, author, publishing_house, translator, year_of_publication, pages, ISBN, original_price, current_price, score, number_of_people, brief_introduction, author_introduction, catalog, label, img_url
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from book
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert ignore into book (id, book_name, author, publishing_house, translator, year_of_publication, pages, ISBN, original_price, current_price, score, number_of_people, brief_introduction, author_introduction, catalog, label, img_url ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishingHouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{translator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yearOfPublication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=REAL}, #{numberOfPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{briefIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
